title: Current work
description: We're currently working on our 2025 Australian Rover Challenge Entry, with a focus on the software and science subsystem. We're growing our team, so come get involved!
The ROAR Team achieved a fantastic 4th place, with the brand new Perseus, and with the help of our mini-rover Talaria!
The ROAR Team's first year saw Artemis compete, winning 4th place!
